import React from 'react' export default class Form extends React.Component { state = { title: '', genre: 'Action', imgURL: '', hours: 0 } handleChange = (e) => { this.setState({ [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } handleColor = (e) => { let colorIn= ["#7AF377"] e.target.style.color = colorIn } changeToBlack = e => { let colorOut = ['#000'] e.target.style.color = colorOut } render() { return (
this.props.addNewGameToList(e, this.state)}>
) } }
